name: VMware-VirtualCenter
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: VMware VirtualCenter is a software suite designed to centralize the management of virtualized IT environments.

matches.text: <meta name="description" content="VMware vSphere is virtual infrastructure software for partitioning, consolidating and managing systems in mission-critical environments. VMware ESX Server provides a highly scalable platform with advanced resource management capabilities, which can be managed by vSphere.">
